main event: A metallic, saucer-shaped object was observed hovering at around 10 meters altitude near Garwd, Poland on October 27, 1957.
interesting points: The object was approximately 10 cm wide and silently moved from side to side in a horizontal plane.
The object was first noticed due to its illumination, which was initially bright but then dimmed.
The object was seen by several persons but no features could be discerned.
The object disappeared below the horizon according to the observers.
The weather conditions were calm and clear at the time of the sighting.
